sense.gloss: large-hearted, generous, liberal, open-handed, magnanimous, easygoing
to have a talented child despite being untalented, a black hen lays a white egg, a kite gives birth to a hawk

r_ele.r: のうあるたかはつめをかくす

sense.gloss: a wise man keeps some of his talents in reserve, one shouldn't show off, the person who knows most often says least, a skilled hawk hides its talons
nightjar (any bird of family Caprimulgidae), goatsucker
soba vendors who walk around at night, soba sold by these vendors
ambulatory evening vendor of noodles (or the noodles themselves)
extremely spicy form of chili pepper
small hawk or falcon (used for hunting)
group of buzzards (etc.) rising in an updraft (before the southward autumn migration), pillar of buzzards
eyes of a predator, keen eyes, eyes of a cormorant, eyes of a hawk

k_ele.e: ホイップアーウイル夜鷹
ホイッパーウィル夜鷹

r_ele.r: ホイップアーウイルよたか
ホイッパーウィルよたか
ホイップアーウイルヨタカ
ホイッパーウィルヨタカ

sense.gloss: Hodgson's hawk eagle (Nisaetus nipalensis), mountain hawk-eagle

r_ele.r: たかかしてはととなる
たかけしてはととなる

sense.gloss: one of the 72 climates (from the 11th of the second lunar month until the 15th)
crested honey buzzard (Pernis ptilorhynchus), Oriental honey buzzard, pern
Chinese sparrowhawk (Accipiter soloensis), gray frog hawk, grey frog hawk

r_ele.r: よくのくまたかまたさく

sense.gloss: avarice brings doom upon oneself, grasp all, lose all, the greedy hawk-eagle splits in half (when trying to catch two boars at once)

r_ele.r: いちふじにたかさんなすび

sense.gloss: best is Fuji, second is a hawk, third is an eggplant (of auspicious things to see in a dream, esp. one's first dream of the year)
vulture fund, fund that buys distressed stocks at low prices and sells for a profit

sdata.j: ↑鵜↑↓う↓の↑目↑↓め↓↑鷹↑↓たか↓の↑目↑↓め↓で↑探↑↓さが↓していたよ。
sdata.e: He was looking for it like a hunting dog.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑本↑↓ほん↓の↑矢↑↓や↓が↑鷹↑↓たか↓を↑貫通↑↓つらぬきとお↓した。
sdata.e: An arrow passed through the hawk.

sdata.j: ↑鷹↑↓たか↓は↑鋭↑↓するど↓い↑目↑↓め↓を↑持↑↓も↓っている。
↑鳶↑↓とんび↓が↑鷹↑↓たか↓を↑生↑↓う↓む。
↑何故↑↓なぜ↓か↑鷹派↑↓たかは↓と↑目↑↓もく↓される↑人↑↓ひと↓たちが、ことごとく↑苦手↑↓にがて↓。
sdata.e: For some reason, I don't cope well with those recognized as hardliners.

sdata.j: ↑能↑↓のう↓ある↑鷹↑↓たか↓は↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑隠↑↓かく↓す。
sdata.e: A smart falcon hides its talons.

sdata.j: ↑能↑↓のう↓ある↑鷹↑↓たか↓は↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑隠↑↓かく↓す。
sdata.e: He who knows the most often says the least.
